OOC: Tankor is a dick no matter what he says.

And I don't give a shit what=
 any of you think about that.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Tank=
or 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, June 12, 2003 8:06 PM
 =
 Subject: Re: Majorly great news!


  this is great news no matter what hol=
lywood says

  Hollywood Narrator <hollywood.narrator@...> wrote: 
=
    OOC: This mail is going to seem VERY angry. All of my mails do anyway, =
please remember.

    I honestly don't understand why this is great news. W=
henever they announce stuff like this, I just become worried. VERY worried.=
 What happens if it sucks? I'll be VERY mad indeed. I think it'll be great =
news when the movie is out and DOESN'T suck. I'm honestly more excited abou=
t their next line of Transformers for 2004, their 20th anniversary line ent=
itled Transformers Energon. I KNOW their toys will always be good. In case =
you don't understand where I'm coming from, I thought Beast Wars was a good=
 show. It pailed in comparison to the original Transformers, but it was goo=
d. However, it could have been SO much better as just an ordinary cartoon l=
ike the original Transformers instead of computer generation. So the idea b=
ehind a live action movie makes me think things like "who's writing it? Wha=
t's the budget? Will Hasbro watch over it? Will they make it as bad an adap=
tation as The Running Man?" I know you're all thinking that I should be mor=
e optimistic, but you've seen how characters can be completely warped, as p=
roof of it occurred in Beast Machines. Forgive the fact that this mail was =
so long. Also forgive the fact that I'm still working on my upcoming storyl=
ines.

      ----- Original Message -----
      From: EmprzAnastazia@...=
m
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
      Sent: Wednesday, June 11, 2003 7:5=
0 PM
      Subject: OOC: Majorly great news!


      Hasbro has made an off=
icial press release of a Live Action Transformers movie! Release date TBA. =


      Check out www.hasbro.com for the press release!

      Stac
